jd: Hello,Hope you are doing goodTitle: Azure Tech LeadLocation: Plano TX Onsite 5 daysDuration : 6 months contract to hire+10 yearsNO OPT and CPTDescription:* ETL processes to support data extraction, transformation and loading using Azure Data Factory.* Ensuring data quality and accuracy, optimizing data processing performance, developing, and* maintaining data models and schemas.* Microsoft Azure computing services such as Azure Function Apps, App Services, Logic Apps, Event Hubs & Event Grid, API Management, Azure Storage.* SQL queries with various relational databases such as Oracle and MS SQL/PL-SQL.* Database optimization (query speed and scalability - tables, views, indexes, etc.) and query tuning.* Good knowledge of APIs - development and testing with SWAGGER, POSTMAN etc. REST APIs* Plan, design, and implement complex technical and functional services and system-level design.* Collaborate with a variety of stakeholders, such as business analysts, developers, project managers, and end users, to understand customer needs, requirements, and goals.* Experience with event-driven and microservices architectures.* Good knowledge of various tools like FileZilla used for file transfer protocols (SFTP).* Strong experience in requirement gathering from the onsite business team, documenting, and passing to offshore development team.* Good to have some familiarity in Wealth Management concepts and data types (positions, tax lots, transactions – trades, cash flows)
